feed.title: Red Earth Creek - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Earth 02:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -28.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.7°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
